We love to see new #UMASS @coachFMartin showing love to one of the baddest #Boricuas to play college hoops. @ctrav24 & Padilla locked it down with Camby!

https://t.co/dDXf5eocSG https://t.co/ZPcnJibSuw

Last night, Vladimir Guerrero Jr. became only the 12th Dominican slugger to have a pair of three-home run games in his career. 

The Dominican-Canadian accomplished a feat that even his Hall of Fame dad Vladimir Guerrero Sr. couldn’t in the majors.
